Package net.hudup.core.alg

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Alg
    Alg is the most abstract interface for all algorithms.
    AlgRemote
    This interface represents a remote algorithm.
    Aug
    This interface declares the most powerful algorithm and such algorithm is atomic.
    AugRemote
    This interface represents remote interface for AUgorithm Aug, called remote AUgorithm.
    CompositeAlg
    This interface indicates a composite algorithm that uses one or more other algorithms to run.
    CompositeRecommender
    Recommendation strategy is defined as the co-ordination of recommendation algorithms such as collaborative filtering and content-based filtering in accordance with coherent process so as to achieve the best result of recommendation.
    DuplicatableAlg
    This interface represents the algorithm that are able to be duplicated.
    ExecutableAlg
    This interface represents extension of an executable algorithm.
    ExecutableAlgRemote
    This interface represents a executable remote algorithm.
    KBase
    Data in Hudup framework is organized into two following formats:
    Low-level format is structured as rating matrix whose each row consists of user ratings on items, often called raw data.
    MemoryBasedAlg
    This interface indicates an memory-based algorithm.
    MemoryBasedRecommender
    Two typical inherited interfaces of Recommender are MemoryBasedRecomender and ModelBasedRecommender which in turn are interfaces for memory-based recommendation algorithm and model-based recommendation algorithm.
    ModelBasedAlg
    This interface indicates an algorithm that learns and uses knowledge base to execute.
    ModelBasedRecommender
    Two typical inherited interfaces of Recommender are MemoryBasedRecomender and ModelBasedRecommender which in turn are interfaces for memory-based recommendation algorithm and model-based recommendation algorithm.
    NoteAlg
    This interface represents algorithms having note.
    RecommendContextPrefilter
    Traditional recommendation study focuses on inherent information about users and items and how to recommend such relevant items to such users.
    Recommender
    This interface represents all recommendation algorithms.
    RecommenderRemote
    This interface represents a remote recomendation algorithm.
    RecommendFilter
    This interface represents a filter which is performed before any recommendation tasks.
    RmiAlg
    This interface indicates an RMI service considered as an algorithm.
    ServiceAlg
    This interface indicates an service considered as an algorithm.
    ServiceRecommender
    This is not real recommender (recommendation algorithm).
    SetupAlgListener
    This interface represents a listener for successful setting up process.
    SocketAlg
    This interface indicates an socket service considered as an algorithm.
    SupportCacheAlg
    This interface represents algorithms which support to cache in calculation or in doing some tasks.
    SupportCacheAlg.Task
    Task interface for putting result into cache.
    TestAlg
    This interface represents the algorithm only for testing.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlgAbstract
    This is abstract class of Alg interface.
    AlgDesc
    This class represents description of an algorithm.
    AlgDescList
    This class represents a list of algorithm descriptions.
    AlgList
    This class is used to store many algorithms.
    AlgRemoteWrapper
    The class is a wrapper of remote algorithm.
    AugAbstract
    This class implements partially the AUgorithm Aug.
    AugRemoteWrapper
    This class is wrapper of remote AUgorithm AugRemote.
    CompositeRecommenderAbstract
    This abstract class implements basically the recommendation strategy (composite recommender) represented by the interface @link CompositeRecommender}.
    ExecutableAlgAbstract
    This is the most abstract class for executable algorithm.
    ExecutableAlgRemoteWrapper
    The class is a wrapper of remote executable algorithm.
    KBaseAbstract
    This abstract implements partially KBase interface by adding a configuration KBaseAbstract.config to configure it and a data source KBaseAbstract.datasource to point to where to locate the dataset from which this knowledge base is learned (trained).
    KBaseRecommendIntegrated
    This abstract class models a so-called integrated KBase, which provides advances methods on knowledge base.
    MemoryBasedRecommenderAbstract
    This class implements basically the memory-based recommendation algorithm represented by the interface MemoryBasedRecomender.
    ModelBasedRecommenderAbstract
    This class implements basically the model-based recommendation algorithm represented by the interface ModelBasedRecomender.
    RecommendContextPrefilterImpl
    This class is default implementation of context pre-filter recommendation algorithm represented by interface RecommendContextPrefilter.
    RecommenderAbstract
    This abstract class implements basically recommendation algorithms.
    RecommenderRemoteWrapper
    The class is a wrapper of remote recommendation algorithm.
    RecommendFilterList
    This class contains a list of filters, called filter list as a convention.
    RecommendFilterParam
    Before recommendation task is performed (for example, producing a list of recommended items), the filtering tasks are performed.
    RecommendParam
    When a recommendation task is performed, a parameter of recommendation needs to be provided as an indicator.
    RmiRecommender
    This interface indicates an RMI service considered as an recommendation algorithm.
    ServiceRecommenderAbstract
    This abstract class implements basically the recommendation service represented by service recommender interface.
    SetupAlgEvent
    This class represents an event fired by a source (often evaluator) for successful setting up an algorithm.
    SocketRecommender
    This interface indicates an socket service considered as a recommendation algorithm.
    SupportCacheAlgAbstract
    This abstract implements basically algorithms which support to cache in calculation or in doing some tasks.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AlgDesc.MethodologyType
    Type of algorithm.
    SetupAlgEvent.Type
    Type of setting up event.
